text: Kratos Defense and Security Solutions, Inc. title: Is Kratos Defense Poised to Gain From a Higher US Defense Budget?
text: KTOS could gain from a proposed jump in US defense spending, boosting demand for unmanned systems, hypersonics and other next-gen programs.
